attributes.action: Abolish unfair pricing within his constituency at Fife Coucil Leisure Centres
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Throughout Fife there is an unfair pricing structure used in all Community and Leisure Centres for the use of public halls.

We believe this to be hampering the same Governmental policy attempting to rid Scotland as "The Sick Man of Europe"

Sign our petition to lend your support to this campaign.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive as appropriate.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
